channel.title: Comments on: Has anybody played blasphemous and is it any good ?

item.title: By: CJ36
item.dc:creator: CJ36
item.description: One of my favourite metroid-likes! Just 1 trophy left for platinum, and an expansion and sequel are coming!
item.content:encoded: One of my favourite metroid-likes! Just 1 trophy left for platinum, and an expansion and sequel are coming!

item.title: By: meatball402
item.dc:creator: meatball402
item.description:
It's a really good game. Its metroidvania with some really good art and design and bosses that aren't a pushover.
If you have the chance and are into that kind of game I definitely recommend it.
item.content:encoded:
It’s a really good game. Its metroidvania with some really good art and design and bosses that aren’t a pushover.

If you have the chance and are into that kind of game I definitely recommend it.

item.title: By: casualringbearer
item.dc:creator: casualringbearer
item.description: Yes , it's great and better than Salt and Sanctuary and death's gambit imo
item.content:encoded: Yes , it’s great and better than Salt and Sanctuary and death’s gambit imo

item.title: By: nge1301
item.dc:creator: nge1301
item.description: Has anyone played both Hollow Knight and Blasphemous and have a few words of comparison between both? I absolutely loved Hollw Knight, was my first metroid-vania, and to me it was the perfect 2D Bloodborne/Dark Souls (I'm also a fan of the soulsborne series). So how does Blasphemous compare, in terms of difficulty, length, art, etc.?
item.content:encoded:
Has anyone played both Hollow Knight and Blasphemous and have a few words of comparison between both?
I absolutely loved Hollw Knight, was my first metroid-vania, and to me it was the perfect 2D Bloodborne/Dark Souls (I’m also a fan of the soulsborne series).
So how does Blasphemous compare, in terms of difficulty, length, art, etc.?

item.title: By: bufftbone
item.dc:creator: bufftbone
item.description: Yes and yes. Matroidvania style game huge hit in the r/metroidvania sub
item.content:encoded: Yes and yes. Matroidvania style game huge hit in the r/metroidvania sub

item.title: By: krakenvictim
item.dc:creator: krakenvictim
item.description: It’s super fucking hard. I suck at it but if you like that sort of thing go for it!
item.content:encoded: It’s super fucking hard. I suck at it but if you like that sort of thing go for it!

item.title: By: Major-Firefighter261
item.dc:creator: Major-Firefighter261
item.description: Excelent gameplay and all, but man, the spanish ambience is so beautiful.
item.content:encoded: Excelent gameplay and all, but man, the spanish ambience is so beautiful.

item.title: By: SerMercutio
item.dc:creator: SerMercutio
item.description: It's a brilliant and challenging game with much to explore, beautifully pixeled. I'd have loved to play this game 25 years ago when those graphics were still acceptable and a common thing.
item.content:encoded: It’s a brilliant and challenging game with much to explore, beautifully pixeled. I’d have loved to play this game 25 years ago when those graphics were still acceptable and a common thing.
